text: @JoeBiden “...but he has not reacted well"???I hear you talk about POTUS’s failed COVID19 response so matter of factly. Where the hell are your anger, passion, and desire to win hiding? You need a coach to help u express the urgency & disgust voters feel re:45. Connect with our outrage!
